png

Class PngChunkITXT

  • java.lang.Object
    • png.PngChunk
      • png.PngChunkITXT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextualChunk

    public class PngChunkITXT
extends PngChunk
implements TextualChunk
    Extended to support an iTXt chunk in a PNG file, which stores international text data. This chunk supports both compressed and uncompressed UTF-8 encoded text, along with optional language and translated keyword metadata.

    The iTXt chunk layout consists of:

    • Keyword (Latin-1): 1â€“79 bytes + null terminator
    • Compression flag: 1 byte (0 = uncompressed, 1 = compressed)
    • Compression method: 1 byte (must be 0 for zlib/deflate)
    • Language tag (Latin-1): null-terminated string
    • Translated keyword (UTF-8): null-terminated string
    • Text (UTF-8): compressed or plain text depending on the compression flag
    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

      • PngChunkITXT

        public PngChunkITXT(long length,
                    byte[] typeBytes,
                    int crc32,
                    byte[] data)
        Constructs a new PngChunkITXT with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the chunk's data field (excluding type and CRC)
        typeBytes - the raw 4-byte chunk type
        crc32 - the CRC value read from the file
        data - raw chunk data
